Speaker: Shohei Hido

![Logo][/redirect?v=MAz1xolSB68&event=video_description&q=https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fcupy%2Fcupy%2Fmaster%2Fdocs%2Fimage%2Fcupy_logo_1000px.png&redir_token=4wyIbQcU1mynjVesgpyqdtoIgSB8MTUyNjUwODQ2MUAxNTI2NDIyMDYx]

# CuPy : NumPy-like API accelerated with CUDA

[**Website**](https://cupy.chainer.org/) | [**Docs**](https://docs-cupy.chainer.org/en/stable/) | [**Install Guide**](/redirect?v=MAz1xolSB68&event=video_description&q=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs-cupy.chainer.org%2Fen%2Fstable%2Finstall.html&redir_token=4wyIbQcU1mynjVesgpyqdtoIgSB8MTUyNjUwODQ2MUAxNTI2NDIyMDYx) | [**Tutorial**](/redirect?v=MAz1xolSB68&event=video_description&q=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs-cupy.chainer.org%2Fen%2Fstable%2Ftutorial%2F&redir_token=4wyIbQcU1mynjVesgpyqdtoIgSB8MTUyNjUwODQ2MUAxNTI2NDIyMDYx) | **Examples** ([Official](/redirect?v=MAz1xolSB68&event=video_description&q=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fcupy%2Fcupy%2Fblob%2Fmaster%2Fexamples&redir_token=4wyIbQcU1mynjVesgpyqdtoIgSB8MTUyNjUwODQ2MUAxNTI2NDIyMDYx)) | [**Forum**](/redirect?v=MAz1xolSB68&event=video_description&q=https%3A%2F%2Fgroups.google.com%2Fforum%2F%23%21forum%2Fcupy&redir_token=4wyIbQcU1mynjVesgpyqdtoIgSB8MTUyNjUwODQ2MUAxNTI2NDIyMDYx)

CuPy is an open-source library with NumPy syntax that increases speed by doing matrix operations on NVIDIA GPUs. It is accelerated with the CUDA platform from NVIDIA and also uses CUDA-related libraries, including cuBLAS, cuDNN, cuRAND, cuSOLVER, cuSPARSE, and NCCL, to make full use of the GPU architecture. CuPy's interface is highly compatible with NumPy; in most cases it can be used as a drop-in replacement. CuPy supports various methods, data types, indexing, broadcasting, and more.

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2018 and https://github.com/PyCon/2018-slides
title: Shohei Hido - CuPy: A NumPy-compatible Library for GPU - PyCon 2018
